trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection"></xref> objects in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> or a similar control.
trans-unit.target: 提供的元件編輯器<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection"></xref>中的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>或類似的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The HotSpotCollectionEditor class provides a user interface for editing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection> object that is embedded in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> or a similar control.
trans-unit.target: HotSpotCollectionEditor 類別提供的使用者介面編輯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection>物件中內嵌<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>或類似的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: The HotSpotCollectionEditor is invoked by selecting the ellipsis button (**…**) on the **HotSpots** property in the visual designer's **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: 叫用 HotSpotCollectionEditor 藉由選取省略符號按鈕 (**...**) 上**熱點**視覺化設計工具中的屬性**屬性**方格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A> method always returns `false` to indicate that only one object can be selected at a time in the editor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A>方法一律會傳回`false`以指出可以選取該只有一個物件，在編輯器中，一次。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.CanSelectMultipleInstances%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A> method returns an array of types that the editor can create.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A>方法會傳回編輯器可以建立之型別的陣列。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.CreateNewItemTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.HelpTopic%2A> property returns the name of the Help topic that the editor displays.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.HelpTopic%2A>屬性會傳回編輯器會顯示 [說明] 主題的名稱。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor.HelpTopic%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor> class when you select the ellipsis button (**…**) on the **HotSpots** property in the visual designer's **Properties** grid, when designing an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control or other control that encapsulates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 內部建構<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>類別的新執行個體，當您選取省略符號按鈕 (**...**) 上**熱點**視覺化設計工具中的屬性**屬性**方格中，設計時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制項或其他封裝的控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: The type of the collection to edit.
Gets a value indicating whether multiple <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> collection elements can be selected at one time.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否多個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref>可以一次選取集合的項目。

trans-unit.source: The CanSelectMultipleInstances method always returns `false`; thus, only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object can be selected at a time in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor> object.
trans-unit.target: CanSelectMultipleInstances 方法一律會傳回`false`; 因此，只有一個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>中一次，可以選取物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Gets the multiple data types that the collection editor can create.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合編輯器可以建立多個資料類型。

trans-unit.source: The types that the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor> object can create are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PolygonHotSpot>, and others that can be derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> class.
trans-unit.target: 型別，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>物件可以建立會<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PolygonHotSpot>，以及其他可以衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PolygonHotSpot></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: A type array of the data types the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor"></xref> can create.
trans-unit.target: 資料類型的型別陣列<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor"></xref>可以建立。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Help topic to display for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得要顯示的 [說明] 主題<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The HelpTopic property gets the name of the Help topic to display when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor> dialog box **Help** button is clicked or when the **F1** key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: HelpTopic 屬性取得要顯示時的 [說明] 主題的名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>對話方塊**協助**按鈕或當**F1**按鍵。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HotSpotCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the Help topic to display.
trans-unit.target: 字串，指定要顯示 [說明] 主題。
